short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a new fact every day from Wikipedia.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Daily Fact, you can learn something new every day! This Chrome extension fetches a random fact from Wikipedia based on your chosen category and language. Customize the look and feel of your daily facts, including text color and size. Perfect for curious minds who love to expand their knowledge daily. Set your preferred language and category to get the most relevant facts for you.
